videos.description: P.J. Washington tries score, but Goga Bitadze sticks his hand up to reject him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bitadze comes up with a big rejection on Washington) 2021/1/27 ESHEET

videos.description: LaMelo Ball drives in and makes a left-handed no-look pass to Cody Zeller for the jam.
